javax.security.identitystore.query

Interface RoleStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachedIdentityStore

    public interface RoleStore
    RoleStore provides optional, additional role-related queries implemented by the identity store.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getAssignedRoles(String regEx)
      Determines a list of roles found in the identity store, which have been assigned to either a caller or a group.
      List<String> getRoles(String regEx)
      Determines a list of roles found in the identity store.
      List<String> getUnassignedRoles(String regEx)
      Determines a list of roles found in the identity store, which have not been assigned to either a caller or a group.

    • Method Detail

      • getRoles

        List<String> getRoles(String regEx)
        Determines a list of roles found in the identity store.
        Parameters:
        regEx - A regular expression to select roles by name, null or empty string for all.
        Returns:
        The list of found roles, empty list if none, null if not supported.

      • getAssignedRoles

        List<String> getAssignedRoles(String regEx)
        Determines a list of roles found in the identity store, which have been assigned to either a caller or a group.

        NOTE THAT depending on the identity store implementation, this method may only consider roles which are explicitly mapped to callers and groups. Roles assigned via evaluated expressions (e.g., XACML expressions) may not be considered.

        Parameters:
        regEx - A regular expression to select roles by name, null or empty string for all.
        Returns:
        The list of found roles, empty list if none, null if not supported.

      • getUnassignedRoles

        List<String> getUnassignedRoles(String regEx)
        Determines a list of roles found in the identity store, which have not been assigned to either a caller or a group.

        NOTE THAT depending on the identity store implementation, this method may only consider roles which are explicitly mapped to callers and groups. Roles assigned via evaluated expressions (e.g., XACML expressions) may not be considered.

        Parameters:
        regEx - A regular expression to select roles by name, null or empty string for all.
        Returns:
        The list of found roles, empty list if none, null if not supported.
